name.description: The game name to be displayed in Rich Presence and in the game window.

windowTitle.description: The window title which the engine window will have, if defined.

engineVersion.description: Specifies the version a game is for, e.g. "v0.48.0".
engineVersion.markdownDescription: Specifies the version a game is for, e.g. `"v0.48.0"`.

nativeResolution.description: The native resolution of the game.

tickRate.description: The number of ticks to be performed per second. Defaults to 120.
tickRate.markdownDescription: The number of ticks to be performed per second. Defaults to `120`.

renderOnCanvas.description: If set, the game frames will be rendered on a canvas and that canvas will be resized instead of game elements (sprites, fonts, etc.) themselves.

canvasRenderingMode.description: If the canvas rendering is enabled, this field determines the exact rendering properties.

oneOf.description: Default value. The canvas will be stretched to the maximum vertical extent with smooth scaling. The aspect ratio will be preserved.
The canvas will be stretched to the maximum vertical extent without smooth scaling. The aspect ratio will be preserved. When scaled up, every separate pixel will be visible.

richPresence.description: Defines the Discord Rich Presence behavior.

enabled.description: Should be always true, unless you want the game to be a secret. In that case, loading a game with this flag set to false causes Rich Presence to disconnect.
enabled.markdownDescription: Should be always `true`, unless you want the game to be a secret. In that case, loading a game with this flag set to `false` causes Rich Presence to disconnect.

applicationID.description: Optional. If defined, this will be used as an Application ID when running this game, instead of the default OpenSMCE one.

useUI2.description: Enables experimental UI2 support. The game will launch using UI2 instead of legacy UI.
